item.title: Can close, thank you very much Scape-JAVA
item.dc:creator: @artyr artyr
item.description:
@artyr wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:8, topic:362848”][quote author=artyr link=topic=459124.msg3359191#msg3359191 date=1286199765]

you need to use “Tab” in shops.cfg and autospawn.cfg

Give an example correct Please!

Now I even can’t simply to make NPC monsters , mans or others
[/quote]

NumberFormatException occurs when you don’t use tabs in cfg files, you used the space bar instead of the tabs key, ALWAYS use tabs in cfg folders.[/quote]

Thank very much, you really right, now i can make npc monsters, and now go try make NPC shop.

Read full topic
item.source: Can close, thank you very much Scape-JAVA

item.title: Can close, thank you very much Scape-JAVA
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“artyr, post:7, topic:362848”][quote author=Dastan_ link=topic=459124.msg3359189#msg3359189 date=1286199628]
you need to use “Tab” in shops.cfg and autospawn.cfg
[/quote]

Give an example correct Please!

Now I even can’t simply to make NPC monsters , mans or others[/quote]

NumberFormatException occurs when you don’t use tabs in cfg files, you used the space bar instead of the tabs key, ALWAYS use tabs in cfg folders.

Read full topic

item.title: Can close, thank you very much Scape-JAVA
item.dc:creator: @artyr artyr
item.description:
@artyr wrote:

Dastan_:

what do you mean it can’t make shops? do you know how to make shops?

Error When i try make a new shops:
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source)
at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java80)
at ShopHandler.(ShopHandler.java:33)
at server.main(server.java:127)

How i can make a shop? (i added the)
in autospawn.cfg:spawn = 522 3208 3422 0 0 0 0 0 1 Arhien-General Store
in shops.cfg:shop = 19 Test_Shop 1 1 316 500 444 500
in client.java:} else if (NPCID == 522) {
// Test_Shop
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 19;

  • Give an example correct (How you make new shops)

Read full topic
